name: Minotaur Skeleton
description: The Minotaur Skeleton is an undead creature appearing as a large, reanimated skeletal minotaur wielding large, rusted weapons. It lacks flesh and possesses immense strength.
memorable: Its ability to ambush players while motionless presents a unique tactical challenge.
goals: Often found guarding ancient ruins or tombs, serving dark masters.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or creatures controlled by necromantic forces.
environment: Typically found in ancient ruins, dungeons, or tombs.
strengths: High damage output through melee attacks and the ability to charge, causing additional damage.
weaknesses: Relatively low armor class and limited mobility, making it vulnerable to clever tactics.
attacks: Can attack with a greataxe or gore with its horns, dealing significant slashing or piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Charge ability allows it to inflict extra damage and knock foes prone after a strong charge.
skills: Lacks strategic intelligence but uses its charge and counterattack effectively in combat.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and exhaustion effects.
Can remain motionless and appear as an ordinary skeleton, aiding in ambush tactics.
Possesses labyrinthine memories, providing it advantage on navigation checks.
